extendedInfo.description: This Hip hop music and rap star quiz will test your memory and knowledge with some of the toughest questions in hip hop and rap music industry! Everything from old school names to new stuff!You can play the quiz over and over because there are many questions, and new hip hop hit related questions will be added in new versions of this quiz app! Questions sometimes ask about information from song lyrics, some of them are involving song production and record companies, some are asking about the most popular rap stars in their younger days when they used to work with eachother and so on!Just to name a few of the artists mentioned inside: Snoop Dogg, Beastie Boys, Jay-Z, 2Pac, Kanye West, Eminem, Roger Troutman, Run DMC, Nelly, Xzibit and a few dozen more, so be prepared!There are a few real easy rap questions, but most of them are pretty tough so only the real fans will be able to ace this test! We have four groups of questions so if having them all in the pool at once is too much, you can click some of them off and lower the complexity, making the game easier to learn.Gameplay itself is limited to two minutes, so be sure to select your answers quickly. Play against the clock, or test your friends and compare results :)No cheat codes, no trivia - answers list, if you want answers, google is your friend, youtube can help too (more fun, and you can remember the old hits that you used to listen while you hunt for lyrics.Please rate the app well so other people can find it and enjoy it too :) Hopefully soon we will be able to add a multiplayer scoreboard so you'll see your ranking. Inside the app is our contact info, if you have troubles or want to send us more questions for next editions of the app.App is free - ad supported (one ad per day).

reviews.title: Nice one
reviews.comment: Found out some cool facts about my fav stars
reviews.author: Slobodan Andrijevic
